Q_DESC: Chef has a number D containing only digits 0s and 1s. He wants to make the number to have all the digits same. For that, he will change exactly one digit, i.e. from 0 to 1 or from 1 to 0. If it is possible to make all digits equal (either all 0s or all 1s) by flipping exactly 1 digit then output Yes, else print No (quotes for clarity)
